This Chrome extension instantly translates popular Gen Z phrases and abbreviations into plain English. Whether you're deciphering TikTok captions, Instagram comments, or group chats, we've got you covered.

Slangify is the ultimate Chrome extension for decoding and translating GenZ slang! Whether you're trying to understand the latest trends or just want to brush up on your slang game, Slangify is here to help. With a user-friendly interface and easy access to slang meanings, you'll quickly learn the true meaning behind phrases like "no cap," "bet," and "slay." Perfect for anyone looking to stay on top of modern language and youth culture. Start speaking the language of today with Slangify!
